p: These measures do not strengthen the immune system, and may in fact weaken the immune systems of healthy people by restricting those continual immune challenges that strengthen the healthy immune system. Continuing these restrictive measures during the post-lockdown transition period may be useful for the most vulnerable demographic described above, but may be overly restrictive for the vast majority of the population. There is no unanimity within the medical community on whether or not it is counter-productive to require severe restrictions on the vast majority of the total population when only required by a very small minority of the total population.
